A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A complete disgrace. Mark Hamill was right to say the script was wrong for Luke. Disney has disrespected the Star Wars legacy by bringing politics into the movie. Disney had two goals with this movie: 1. Instill more females into Star wars in power positions 2. Make money.  The lack of strong and inspiring male leadership is incredibly disheartening to see but only makes sense when you look at the man directing this abomination.
